data.message: hey hows it going this thanksgiving we are missing 2 at the table in july my niece lost her battle of cancer only 16 4 days later my father died of cancer so pray for all of us pray for my sister shes having a hard time since her daughter claire died i know what its like i also lost my youngest daughter theres no greater pain than a mother that burries her child ill talk to u later praying for u
